Package org.jboss.windup.reporting.freemarker

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WindupFreeMarkerMethod
    This interface provides us with a way of looking up all TemplateMethodModel implementations within various windup-related addons.
    WindupFreeMarkerTemplateDirective
    This interface provides us with a way of looking up all TemplateDirectiveModel implementations within various windup-related addons.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EffortPointsToCssClass
    Converts from a number of effort points (story points) to a Css class.
    0 == info
    0-7 == warning
    8-13 == severe
    >13 == critical
    FileModelToSourceReportModelMethod
    This FreeMarker method simply finds the SourceReport that is associated with the provided FileModel, if there is a SourceReport available.
    FreeMarkerIterationOperation
    This class is used to produce a freemarker report from inside of a Windup Iteration.
    FreeMarkerOperation
    This class is used to produce a freemarker report (and the associated ReportModel) from outside of an Iteration context.
    FreeMarkerUtil
    This class contains several useful utility functions that can be used for rendering a freemarker template within Windup.
    FurnaceFreeMarkerTemplateLoader  
    GenerateGUIDMethod
    Generates a unique identifier as a String.
    GetAllFreeMarkerDirectivesMethod
    Returns a list of all FreeMarker Template Directives that have been added by Windup and the currently loaded addons.
    GetAllFreeMarkerMethodsMethod
    Returns a list of all FreeMarker methods that have been added by Windup and the currently loaded addons.
    GetArchiveSHA1ToPathsMapperMethod
    Gets an instance of ArchiveSHA1ToFilePathMapper that is used for mapping from a SHA1 String to a list of paths where this archive can be found.
    GetClassificationForFile
    Gets the classification for the provided FileModel.
    GetEffortCountForProjectByIssueCategoryMethod
    Gets the number of incidents involved in migrating this application Called from a freemarker template as follows:
    GetEffortDescriptionForPoints
    Given a number of points, return a short textual description (eg, Trivial or Complex).
    GetEffortDetailsForProjectTraversalMethod
    Gets the number of effort points involved in migrating this application.
    GetEffortForFile
    Gets the number of effort points involved in migrating this particular file Called from a freemarker template as follows: getMigrationEffortPointsForFile(FileModel):int
    GetProjectTraversalMethod
    Gets a ProjectModelTraversal instance for the given ProjectModel.
    GetTagsFromFileClassificationsAndHints
    Gets all tags from the classifications associated with the provided FileModel.
    GetTechnologyTagsForFile
    Gets all technology tags for the provided FileModel (eg, "EJB", "Web XML").
    GetTechnologyTagsForProject
    Gets all technology tags for the provided ProjectModelTraversal and all of its subprojects (eg, "EJB", "Web XML").
    GetWindupBrandNameMethod  
    IsReportableFile
    This determines whether or not the given file is interesting to report on.
    IsRulePhaseMethod
    Returns true if the passed in object is a and instanceof RulePhase.
    isRulePhase(Object):boolean
    IterableToListMethod
    Turns the given Iterable into a List.
    MapToJsonMethod
    Gets the number of effort points involved in migrating this application.
    MarkdownToHtmlMethod
    Converts from an input string in Markdown format to an output string in HTML.
    ProjectModelToApplicationIndexMethod
    Given a ProjectModel, return the ApplicationReportIndexModel that is associated with the application.
    ProjectModelToOrganizationsMethod
    Given a ProjectModel, return the Iterable that is associated with the application.
    RenderRuleLinkDirective  
    Sha1HexMethod
    Returns the SHA1 Hex hash for the provided FileModel.
    sha1Hex(FileModel):String
    SortApplicationsListMethod
    Sorts the given list of ApplicationReportModel's by it's root filename or, for VIRTUAL apps, by the name.
    SortFilesByPathMethod
    Sorts file paths according to their alphabetical order.
    SortProjectsByPathMethod
    Takes a list of ProjectModels and orders them according to their path.
    SortProjectTraversalsByPathMethod
    Takes a list of ProjectModels and orders them according to their path.
    ToHtmlSerializerExtended  
    WriteToDiskDirective
    Writes the contents of the directive to disk in the reports data directory.
